SELECT TU.USHER_ID, TU.USHER_NAME, TU.COMPANY_NAME, TU.COMPANY_NAME, TU.ORG_ID, TU.ORG_NAME, TU.PHONE_NO,TU.SEX, TU.IDENTITY_NO,TUWD.WORK_DAYS FROM T_USHER TU LEFT JOIN T_USHER_WORK_DAYS TUWD ON TUWD.USHER_ID = TU.USHER_ID AND TUWD.WORK_YEAR_MONTH = #{queryParam.workYearMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
TU.USHER_DELFLAG = '0'
AND TU.USHER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParam.usherName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND TU.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParam.companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND TU.ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryParam.orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
